zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，关注关键支撑]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）在13.1048美元附近波动，整体价格走势表现出一定的震荡整理特征。由于最近24小时的价格变化仅为0.18%，表明市场参与者对当前价格水平的认同，缺乏强烈的买入或卖出意愿。在这样的市场环境中，投资者应保持警惕，关注价格突破的方向。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI（相对强弱指数）数据缺失，但MACD显示出-0.12943411的负值，暗示短期内卖压略显强劲。与此同时，20日简单移动平均线（SMA）为13.41354，当前价格低于该水平，进一步确认了短期内可能存在的下行压力。投资者需密切关注这些指标的变化，以便及时调整交易策略。

支撑位方面，13.0691美元是近期低点，若价格跌破该支撑位，可能进一步承压，测试更低的价格区间。相对的，13.1222美元则是近期的阻力位，如若突破，将可能引发短期的反弹行情。因此，投资者可重点关注这两个关键水平，以制定相应的交易策略。

在交易建议上，考虑到当前市场的震荡特征，建议投资者采取观望策略，耐心等待价格突破支撑或阻力位后再进行操作。此外，设定合理的止损位，确保在不利情况下能有效控制风险，以保护投资资金。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 13.1048, reflecting a modest 24-hour change of 0.18%. This slight upward movement suggests a consolidation phase following recent volatility. Analyzing the high and low of the day at 13.1222 and 13.0691 indicates a range-bound scenario, where price action is confined within these levels. Traders should watch for a breakout above 13.12 to confirm bullish momentum or a drop below 13.07 that could signal further bearish pressure.

The absence of an RSI reading necessitates caution, as this indicator typically helps gauge overbought or oversold conditions. Meanwhile, the MACD shows a negative value of -0.12943411, suggesting that momentum is currently bearish. This aligns with the price being below the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 13.41354, indicating that the asset may struggle to regain upward momentum in the near term. A watchful trading strategy is warranted, particularly if the price can reclaim the SMA, which may act as a key resistance level.

Support levels can be identified around the recent low of 13.0691, while resistance is likely near the SMA at 13.41354. If the price breaks below the established support, it could lead to a retest of lower levels, potentially around the 12.80 mark. Conversely, successful testing of the resistance at the SMA may provide a bullish outlook, prompting traders to consider long positions with an eye on higher targets.

In light of the current technical setup, a cautious approach is advisable. Traders should consider setting stop-loss orders just below the support level to mitigate risks. Additionally, monitoring volume trends will be essential for confirming any breakout or breakdown. Overall, patience and careful observation will be key in navigating the AVAX/USD pair in the coming sessions.
